article.title: Fidelity Technologies Receives U.S. Army Contract to Support Electrical Requirements
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Fidelity Technologies Corporation has received a U.S. Army contract with a potential value of $124 million over five years. Fidelity will manufacture an advanced type of circuit protection called the Power Distribution Illumination System, Electrical. The units will control the amount of power that flows from generators to the standard electrical requirements the soldiers use.
